person.persName: Michael Razor (Henry County tavern keeper and soldier in the 13th and 47th Kentucky Infantry)

body.p: A Kentucky tavern keeper and soldier. Lived in Henry County, Kentucky in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in 1860. Operated a Henry County tavern in 1850. Served as a private in the 13th Kentucky Infantry from December 1861 to June 1863. Promoted to lieutenant in the 47th Kentucky Infantry in June
